src:
Apple Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First Deals
03 Nov 2019 by Gordon Kelly
This story was written in collaboration with Forbes Finds. Forbes Finds covers products we think you’ll love. Featured products are independently selected and linked to for your convenience. If you buy something using a link on this page, Forbes may receive a small share of that sale.Apple’s Black Friday 2019 sales are always a mess, but thankfully the biggest retailers are on hand to save the day with sales already live from Walmart, from Best Buy and a major Apple sale from Amazon. Here is a roundup of the hottest new Black Friday deals on Apple iPhones, iPads, MacBooks, AirPods and the Apple Watch. Many of which will not be bettered on Black Friday itself. 


Apple Black Friday 2019 sales have begun with some massive discounts you won't beat on Black Friday ... [+] itselfAFP via Getty Images












Amazon Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Best Black Friday iPhone Deals


Apple iPhone XS, 256GB, Space Gray - Fully Unlocked (Renewed) - $699.97 (save $600 on original price) - Amazon - shop deal now
Apple iPhone XR, 64GB, White - Fully Unlocked (Renewed) - $522.99 (save $40 on original price) - Amazon - shop deal now 
Apple iPhone 8, 64GB, Space Gray - Fully Unlocked (Renewed) - $347.99 (save $100 on original price) - Amazon - shop deal now 
Apple iPhone 6S, GSM Unlocked, 64GB - Rose Gold (Renewed) - $159.99 (old model, but a stunning price) - Amazon - shop deal now



Amazon's big Apple sale is live nowAmazon


Apple Black Friday iPad Deals


Apple iPad Pro (11-inch, Wi-Fi, 64GB) - Space Gray (Latest Model) - $674.00 (save $125.00) - Amazon - shop deal now 
Apple iPad Air (10.5-inch, Wi-Fi, 64GB) - Space Gray (Latest Model) - $469.00 (save $30) - Amazon - shop deal now
Apple iPad (6th Gen) 128GB Wi-Fi - $299 (save $130) - Walmart - shop deal now


Apple Black Friday MacBook Deal


15-inch MacBook Pro with Touch Bar, Intel Core i7 2.6GHz, Pro 555X, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Space Gray (Mid 2019) - $2,399.00 (save $200) - Adorama - shop deal now
15-inch MacBook Pro with Touch Bar, Intel Core i9 2.4GHz, Pro Vega 20, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, Space Gray (Mid 2019) - $3,999.00 (save $350) - Adorama - shop deal now
12-inch MacBook, Intel Core i5 Dual-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD (Late 2018), Gold - Adorama - shop deal now
12-inch MacBook, Intel Core m3 Dual-Core, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, (Late 2018), Gold - $999.00 (save $300) - shop deal now 
Mac Mini 3.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7, 8GB RAM, 1TB SSD (Late 2018) - Adorama - $1,599.00 (save $100) - shop deal now



Adorama's Apple Black Friday sales are red hot and live nowAdorama


Walmart Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Apple Black Friday Apple Watch Deal


Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cell, 40mm), Stainless Steel with White Sport Band - $749.00 (save $50) - B&H - shop deal now
Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cell, 44mm), Gold Stainless Steel, Gold Milanese Loop - $749.00 (save $50) - B&H - shop deal now
Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS, 40mm) - Space Gray Aluminium Case with Black Sport Band - $349 (save $50) - Amazon - shop deal now
Apple Watch Series 4 GPS + Cellular, 44mm, Sport Loop, Aluminum - $429 (save $100) - shop deal now
Apple Watch Series 3 Bundle - GPS+Cellular - 38mm - Sport Band - Aluminum Case + Bonus MOTILE Power Bank - $229 (save $70 + free power bank) - shop deal now


Apple Black Friday AirPods Deals


Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case (Latest Model) - $164.99 (save $34) - shop deal now 
Apple AirPods with Charging Case (Latest Model - $144 (save $15) - shop deal now



Amazon has two of the best Apple AirPods deals you will find this holiday season and they are live ... [+] nowAmazon


Best Buy Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Apple Black Friday Accessories Deals


Apple Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad (Wireless, Rechargable) (US English) - $112 (save $17) - shop deal now
Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector - $21.70 (save $8.29) - shop deal now
Apple Pencil (2nd Generation) - $120 (save $9) - shop deal now
Apple Magic Mouse 2 (Wireless, Rechargable) - Silver - $69 (save $10) - shop deal now

For me, the standout deals here are the 256GB iPhone XS because, although it is one year old, it’s $400 less than a 256GB iPhone 11 Pro. Amazon’s iPhone 6S is also an incredible deal for a cheap/backup phone and the store’s iPad Pro deal is likely one of the biggest savings you’ll see this holiday season because it’s such a new device. Pay attention to Walmart’s 6th gen iPad deal, this is a rock-solid device. 
Seeing B&H discount the latest MacBook Pros along with the red hot Apple Watch Series 5 is a big surprise, I expected no discounts this year and Amazon’s AirPods deals should be as good as anything you find on Black Friday itself (with more stock now too). 
For my dedicated store-by-store, Black Friday live deals guides you can check out available Amazon deals here, available Best Buy deals here and available Walmart deals here. While Black Friday 2019 shipping policies can be found for Amazon (here), Best Buy (here), Target (here) and Walmart (here).



___
Follow Gordon on Twitter and Facebook 

More of my Black Friday Guides on Forbes
